channel.title: Bubble up fire
channel.description:
what youll need: 1.gas 2.a tube 3.a big bowl 4.some kind of washing up liquid 5.some type of firee
ok,firstly fill up the bowl with water and then squirt some washing up liquid in it then get the gas and get it to travel through the tube in the bowl wait until the bubbles rise up get the fire in an out very quickly
may i say,i am not responsible for what you do with this or whatever happens to you happy burning

item.title: Bubble up fire
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

BloodRayne:

A better way to do it is to get setaline gas and mix it with water, then get a fish tank bubbler, put it in the setaline/water mixture, let it sit for an hour or so with the bubbler on, since the setaline is lighter than air, the bubbles will float, then take a torch to it and watch it burn. There was something like this on Myth Busters, but with different ingredients.[size=1pt]If anything you do in this tutorial made by me causes some type of; disease, burns, pregnancy, aids, or anything, I AM NOT RESPONSIBLE. Consider yourself warned.[/size]

Go the small print. And yeah, I’ll keep that in mind if I die from something, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Bubble up fire
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

what youll need:
1.gas
2.a tube
3.a big bowl
4.some kind of washing up liquid
5.some type of firee

ok,firstly fill up the bowl with water and then squirt some washing up liquid in it
then get the gas and get it to travel through the tube in the bowl
wait until the bubbles rise up
get the fire in an out very quickly

may i say,i am not responsible for what you do with this or whatever happens to you
happy burning
